rows.EXPANDED LABOR SEQUENCE: The full chain from zero to graduated business. Each role creates the conditions for the next.
VA → Chief of Staff → Recruiter → Operator
This was the hiring sequence. It assumed the Trade was already built.
Nilo → VA → CoS → Recruiter → Lead PM → Cluster PMs → Venture Partners → Experts/Investors → CEO Recruiter → CEO
The first 4 links BUILD the Trade. The next 3 links VALIDATE it. The last 2 links DEPLOY it.

rows.col_3: Locks M0 (Trade Thesis). Defines the bet. Sets quality bar. Designs the system.
rows.col_4: Locked M0. Production Architecture. Expert Cluster map. Quality standard.
rows.col_6: VA has clear instructions. Everything downstream has fixed strategic inputs.

rows.col_3: Posts jobs, screens candidates, manages pipeline for CoS hire. Administrative execution.
rows.col_4: Screened CoS candidate pipeline. Interview-ready shortlist.
rows.col_6: CoS hired without Nilo doing admin work.

rows.col_3: Hires Recruiter. Manages production schedule. Coordinates between PM and experts. Tracks progress.
rows.col_4: Recruiter hired. Production Tracker maintained. Expert sessions scheduled.
rows.col_6: Recruiter has JD and sourcing criteria. PM has schedule and support.

rows.col_3: Sources and screens Lead PM candidates. First recruiting engagement.
rows.col_4: Lead PM hired. Someone who can run the production loop.

rows.col_3: Runs the AI production loop. Generates first drafts of ALL 41 models using Claude. Builds the imagination asset — the complete first-draft Trade that makes the opportunity legible.
rows.col_4: Complete first-draft Trade (688 tabs, all filled). Cluster briefs for expert review. This IS the imagination asset.
rows.col_6: Cluster PMs have something concrete to improve. Venture Partners have something to show. Experts have something to react to.

rows.col_3: Each owns one cluster (collection of models). Takes Lead PM's first draft and runs expert calibration loop for their cluster. Uses Claude as interface to the Trade — never navigates the raw spreadsheet.
rows.col_4: A-grade models within their cluster. Expert feedback incorporated. Quality Calibration Log entries.
rows.col_6: Trade goes from draft to expert-grade. Each completed cluster is a proof point for investors.

rows.col_3: PMs identify and recruit VPs through their expert networks. VPs are domain experts willing to go deeper — they don't just review, they validate and connect.
rows.col_4: Introductions to investors. Introductions to domain experts who become advisors. Credibility layer.
rows.col_6: Investors see a validated Trade. Experts provide ongoing advisory. Network effects compound.

rows.col_3: Provide deep domain validation. Introduce investors. Introduce senior experts. Grade the Trade from their domain perspective. By means of doing this, they attract investors.
rows.col_4: Investor introductions. Expert introductions. Domain grades on relevant clusters. Credibility.
rows.col_6: Investors have trusted referral. CEO recruitment has credibility backing.

rows.col_3: Provide grading — the ultimate external validation. Their diligence process IS a quality check on the Trade. Introduce to recruiters and CEO candidates in their network.
rows.col_4: Funding commitment. Validation signal. CEO candidate introductions. Recruiter introductions.
rows.col_6: CEO recruiter has funded company to recruit for. CEO candidates see real opportunity.

rows.col_3: Recruited by CoS or sourced through investor network. Searches for CEO/Operator using the now-complete, funded, expert-validated Trade as the pitch.
rows.col_4: CEO candidate pipeline. Screened and interviewed finalists.
rows.col_6: CEO can be hired into a real company with real funding and a real operating system.

rows.col_3: Executes the Trade. Runs the business using the 41-model operating system. Enrolls in School Model. Gets graded by CM.
rows.col_6: Graduation. Business runs independently. Studio launches next Trade.
